Salesforce Components - ImportExportDocumentsFlowController

Class ImportExportDocumentsFlowController

public without sharing class ImportExportDocumentsFlowController

Description: Apex controller for flow Import/Export Documents. Methods to import and export CSV files from/to Google Firestore References:

Changes

04/11/2021 Initial version. 04/19/2021 Methods to manage customizations in Firestore database. 04/20/2021 Method importItems() now use class CsvHeaders. 04/21/2021 Classes RecordCounter and DocumentReference to enhance code. Item taxPct can be set to null. 06/03/2021 Methods now use class FirestoreService instead of FirestoreController.
